channel.title: Need help to completly start a server!
channel.description:
hi guys,
Tryed previously in the past to create a 317 server, i coded it and it was great. However i could never get my server to let people join. (connection issues). Could somone please help me to completly start up at server. i,e me host.
many thanks

item.title: Need help to completly start a server!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Have you set your enviroment variables? Post what you have set.
Have you set up a No-IP? Do you have No-IP turned on and the hostname checked?
Do you have your No-IP set in the client?
Do you have both ports set the same in the client and server?
Turn off your firewall or make an exception for a program/port.

Also: http://www.canyouseeme.org/

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to completly start a server!
